name: Introduction to Neuroscience
description: A broad overview of the fundamentals of Neuroscience, covering the basics of the structure and function of the nervous system.

name: Neurophysiology
description: A course focused on the physiology of nerve cells and their interactions with one another, with an emphasis on the methods of quantitative analysis.

name: Neurochemistry
description: A course focused on the chemistry of the nervous system, with an emphasis on the chemistry of neurotransmitters and the role they play in the functioning of the nervous system.

name: Cognitive Neuroscience
description: A course exploring the relationship between the brain and behavior, focusing on how the brain influences cognitive processes such as perception, attention, memory, language, and decision-making.
